dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, you know, there's been some really interesting news coming out of Kazakhstan, specifically about Kaspi.kz.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, you know, there's been some really interesting news coming out of Kazakhstan, specifically about Kaspi dot k z.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah? What's up with them? I mean, they're always, like, making headlines, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah? What's up with them? I mean, they're always, like, making headlines, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. So, the President actually got an update on their latest results, and, um, their plans to basically create new services to help small and medium businesses across the country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. So, the President actually got an update on their latest results, and, um, their plans to basically create new services to help small and medium businesses across the country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President was updated on the results of Kaspi.kz and its plans to create new services to help develop small and medium-sized businesses in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's huge! I mean, SME development is so crucial for any economy. What kind of numbers are we talking about here?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's huge! I mean, S M E development is so crucial for any economy. What kind of numbers are we talking about here?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, get this â€“ about seven hundred thousand domestic entrepreneurs are *already* using Kaspi.kz's tech to run their businesses.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, get this - about seven hundred thousand domestic entrepreneurs are already using Kaspi dot k z's tech to run their businesses.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the information presented to the Head of State, today about 700 thousand domestic entrepreneurs are developing their businesses using technologies from Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seven hundred thousand? Wow. That's a massive reach. I, uh, I wonder what that translates to in terms of actual transactions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seven hundred thousand? Wow. That's a massive reach. I, uh, I wonder what that translates to in terms of actual transactions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! In just the first six months of this year, non-cash payments for goods and services hit, like, twelve trillion tenge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! In just the first six months of this year, non-cash payments for goods and services hit, like, twelve trillion tenge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In just the first 6 months of 2024, non-cash payments for goods and services amounted to 12 trillion tenge

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Twelve *trillion*? [overlapping] And that's just half a year? That's insane!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Twelve trillion? And that's just half a year? That's insane!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they also registered one hundred and fifty thousand new individual entrepreneurs in the same period. It's, uh, pretty significant growth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they also registered one hundred and fifty thousand new individual entrepreneurs in the same period. It's, uh, pretty significant growth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In just the first 6 months of 2024, non-cash payments for goods and services amounted to 12 trillion tenge and 150 thousand individual entrepreneurs were registered.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's incredible. And, you know, I also saw something about them helping with taxes? Is that right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's incredible. And, you know, I also saw something about them helping with taxes? Is that right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. They've teamed up with relevant government departments, so Kazakhstanis can pay their taxes on time using these online services.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. They've teamed up with relevant government departments, so Kazakhstanis can pay their taxes on time using these online services.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstanis can pay taxes on time using online services created jointly between Kaspi.kz and the relevant government departments.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's smart. Takes a lot of the friction out, I bet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's smart. Takes a lot of the friction out, I bet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really does. Over one point one trillion tenge in taxes and other payments went through that system in the first half of 2024 alone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really does. Over one point one trillion tenge in taxes and other payments went through that system in the first half of twenty twenty four alone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the first 6 months of 2024, more than 1.1 trillion tenge in taxes and other payments to the budget were made in this way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: One point one trillion... [interrupts] So, like, the government's also benefiting directly from this partnership.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: One point one trillion... So, like, the government's also benefiting directly from this partnership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And the President, uh, he actually noted how important it is to keep assisting SMEs, and he totally expressed his support for Kaspi.kz's shareholders.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And the President, uh, he actually noted how important it is to keep assisting S M E s, and he totally expressed his support for Kaspi dot k z's shareholders.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President noted the importance of further assistance to small and medium-sized businesses in Kazakhstan and in this regard expressed his support to the shareholders of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's a powerful endorsement. It sounds like Kaspi.kz isn't just a tech company, it's, like, a vital part of the national economy now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's a powerful endorsement. It sounds like Kaspi dot k z isn't just a tech company, it's, like, a vital part of the national economy now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. It's fascinating to see that kind of integration and impact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. It's fascinating to see that kind of integration and impact.
